Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #the Desert Colossus# is on the path to #the Tower#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Hyrule Field# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_items: Silver Rupee Pouch (Ganons Castle Light Trial)

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #a Pouch of Silver Rupees for the Bottom of the Well#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Invisible Spikes Silver Rupee Center
hinted_items: Silver Rupee Pouch (Bottom of the Well Basement)

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that lifting a #rock in the desert# reveals a #generic grotto#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: What did Zelda suggest that Link do when diplomacy didn't work?^${12 39 C7}Triforce.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# hoards #the Gerudo Card#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that past a #silver block in the Spirit Temple# boulders and a melody conceal...^ #a Map of the Water Temple# and #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Early Adult Right Chest

GC (Medigoron).text: Don't believe in yourself. Believe in the me that believes in you!

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that the #rainbow bridge# leads to #the Water Temple#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: Boing-oing!^There are times in life when one should seek the help of others...^Thus, when standing alone fails to help, stand together.
